feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Predict patient length of stay and flow
entry.summary: Predict capacity and patient flow for your hospital or healthcare facility so that you can enhance the quality of care and improve operational efficiency.

entry.title: Remote patient monitoring
entry.summary: Provide a high level of preventative medical care with remote patient monitoring from Azure. Analyze large amounts of medical data in a secure environment.

entry.title: Distributed hyperparameter tuning for machine learning models
entry.summary: Use distributed hyperparameter tuning with Azure Machine Learning compute to train scikit-learn and deep learning machine learning models in Python.

entry.title: Build and deploy a social media analytics solution
entry.summary: Build and deploy a social medial analytics solution that uses Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure Cognitive Services with external data.

entry.title: High availability for multitier AKS applications
entry.summary: Read about high availability for multitier application deployment in AKS clusters, including a checklist to identify and eliminate points of failure.

entry.title: Extend Project Online reporting capabilities
entry.summary: Extend the reporting capabilities of Project Online using Azure Logic Apps to import, combine, and process data from multiple tenants.

entry.title: Compliance risk analysis by using Azure Cognitive Search
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a compliance risk analysis solution that's based on real-world experience. It uses Azure Cognitive Search and Azure Cognitive Services.

entry.title: Highly available zone-redundant web application
entry.summary: Learn how to run an Azure App Service application in a zone-redundant configuration to achieve high availability.

entry.title: Cost management for Kubernetes

entry.summary: Read about the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) managed solution, configurations, best practices, and similarities and differences with Amazon EKS.

entry.summary: Understand Kubernetes nodes and node pools, how to handle Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) nodes and node pools, and node pool options for Amazon EKS and AKS.

entry.summary: Understand networking options to securely access the Kubernetes API server, and compare options in Amazon EKS and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

entry.summary: Understand storage options for a Kubernetes cluster, and compare Amazon EKS and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) storage options.

entry.title: Kubernetes workload identity and access
entry.summary: Understand how Kubernetes pods handle identity and access, and compare options in Amazon EKS and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

entry.title: Analytics end-to-end with Azure Synapse
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Data Services to build a modern analytics platform capable of handling the most common data challenges in an organization.

entry.summary: Learn how to establish non-production development and test environments for SAP NetWeaver in a Windows or Linux environment on Azure.

entry.summary: Learn how to deploy an AI-based footfall detection solution for analyzing visitor traffic in retail stores using Azure and Azure Stack Hub.

entry.summary: Learn about options and best practices for using Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway security in virtual networks.

entry.summary: Deploy an application on Azure virtual machines in multiple regions for high availability and resiliency.

entry.summary: Learn about options for using the Asysco Automated Migration Technology (AMT) Framework to migrate Unisys mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.summary: Use virtualization from Unisys and Microsoft Azure to migrate from a Unisys ClearPath Forward Libra mainframe, which allows an accelerated move into Azure.

entry.summary: Migrate a z/OS online transaction processing (OLTP) workload to an Azure application that is cost-effective, responsive, scalable, and adaptable.

entry.summary: Learn how to deploy microservices to Azure Service Fabric, which can be used as a starting point for most cluster configuration deployments.

entry.title: IBM System i (AS/400) to Azure using Infinite i
entry.summary: Use Infinite i to easily migrate your IBM System i (AS/400) workloads to Azure. You can lower costs, improve performance, improve availability, and modernize.

entry.summary: Apply neural style transfer to a video using a convolutional neural network (deep learning) in an Azure Machine Learning pipeline with batch scoring.

entry.summary: Learn about partitioning in Kafka and Event Hubs with Kafka, see how many partitions to use in ingestion pipelines, and also see how to assign events to partitions.

entry.summary: Implement a continuous integration (CI), continuous delivery (CD), and retraining pipeline for an AI application using Azure DevOps and Azure Machine Learning.

entry.summary: Learn about logging, tracing, and monitoring for microservices apps and learn how to run synthetic logging for testing and create structured logs for analysis.

entry.summary: Learn about background tasks that run independently of the user interface, such as batch jobs, intensive processing tasks, and long-running processes.

entry.summary: Use a scalable HTAP architecture with Azure SQL Database to combine transaction processing with analytics. Reduce latencies and costs with in-memory databases.

entry.summary: Use Helm charts when you deploy NiFi on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). Helm streamlines the process of installing and managing Kubernetes applications.

entry.summary: This example describes a data-first approach to middleware integration that enables IBM message queues (MQs).

entry.title: General mainframe refactor to Azure
entry.summary: See how to refactor general mainframe applications to run more cost-effectively and efficiently on Azure.

entry.title: IBM z/OS mainframe migration with Asysco
entry.summary: See how to use the Asysco Automated Migration Technology (AMT) framework to migrate IBM z/OS mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Real-time IoT updates
entry.summary: Use Azure SignalR Service to update cloud applications. This service sends real-time IoT data to clients like web pages and mobile apps.

entry.title: Hybrid file share with disaster recovery for remote and local branch workers
entry.summary: Learn how to provide high-availability desktop access to file shares in an environment with many on-premises locations, and a workforce that works on-premises and remotely.

entry.title: Cross-cloud scaling with Traffic Manager
entry.summary: Use Azure Traffic Manager to automatically add resources to an existing app to accommodate an increase in load.
